Name: Nineteen Twenty Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of redcurrant bunch laid across rim.
Review: Bite-sized and delicately flavoured – the combination of redcurrant syrup and kirsch is almost rose water-like, diluted by dry vermouth with a splash of gin adding botanical complexity.
History: The Nineteen-Twenty Cocktail first appears in Harry McElhone's 1922 Harry's ABC of Mixing Cocktails and also notably in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Nineteen Twenty Cocktail contains 103 calories
